itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway welcome back the one and only Pete Rose to the show to discuss the MLB playoffs and our World Series picks.  Pete tells the most amazing story about Joe DiMaggio's penis you'll ever hear. Charlie Hustle is the f**king best! Ross calls in to make his picks with Dan in Texas.
